All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, Tool
public class DFSAdmin
extends FsShell

This class provides some DFS administrative access.

Author:
Dhruba Borthakur

setSafeMode

public void setSafeMode(String[] argv,
                        int idx)
                 throws IOException
Safe mode maintenance command. Usage: java DFSAdmin -safemode [enter | leave | get]

Parameters:
argv - List of of command line parameters.
idx - The index of the command that is being processed.
Throws:
IOException - if the filesystem does not exist.

decommission

public int decommission(String[] argv,
                        int idx)
                 throws IOException
Command related to decommission of a datanode. Usage: java DFSAdmin -decommission [enter | leave | get]

Parameters:
argv - List of command line parameters. Each of these items could be a hostname or a hostname:portname.
idx - The index of the command that is being processed.
Returns:
0 on success, non zero on error.
Throws:
IOException - if the filesystem does not exist.
